faq.title: Question about PlexView? Answers about PlexView.
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about PlexView

items.question: Who is PlexView for?
items.answer: PlexView is for all real estate professionals: individual owners, property managers, condominium associations, and real estate agencies. Our platform adapts to the size of your portfolio, whether you own a studio or manage hundreds of units.

items.question: How is my data protected?
items.answer: Security is our priority. All your data is end-to-end encrypted and we use secure servers compliant with GDPR standards. We perform regular backups and our systems are audited by cybersecurity experts.

items.question: What makes PlexView different from other solutions?
items.answer: PlexView stands out with its modern and intuitive interface, proactive management approach (anticipatory alerts, optimization suggestions), and a connected ecosystem of qualified partners. Our solution is designed to save you time while optimizing the profitability of your assets.

items.question: What are PlexView's prices?
items.answer: We offer several plans tailored to different needs, from the Essential offer for small owners to the Enterprise offer for professional managers. Final prices will be announced at the official launch, but beta participants will benefit from lifetime preferential conditions.

items.question: How do I join the beta?
items.answer: To join our beta program, simply fill out the registration form at the bottom of the page. Our team will contact you to introduce the platform and help you get started with PlexView.
